  • Class
    Description
    Ability
    An Ability is a single Trait that performs one method on a specific event
    CompoundAbility
    A CompoundAbility is a way to combine several Abilities into one that is viewed as such in the OriginPicker
    IllDefinedTraitException
    Thrown when a Trait is not fully defined
    Trait
    A Trait is a class that simply defines behavior for an Origin
    Trait.Type
    Shows whether a Trait is Positive, Negative, or Neutral
    TraitRegistry
    Static Registry of all the Traits' classes as gotten by a static reflection call
